result.title: RUNTIME_ERROR
result.content:
Can someone please tell me why I'm getting runtime error on A. Infinity Gauntlet. Here is my code:

include<stdio.h>

include<string.h>

void main() { int n,m,i,j; scanf("%d",&n); char input[6][10]; for(i=0;i<n;i++) { scanf("%s", input[i]); } char color[6][10]={ "purple", "green", "blue", "orange", "red", "yellow" }; char stone[6][10]={ "Power", "Time", "Space", "Soul", "Reality", "Mind" }; m=6-n; printf("%d",m);

for(i=0;i<6;i++)
{

    for(j=0;j<n;j++)
    {
        if(strcmp(color[i],input[j])==0)
            break;
    }
    if(j==n)
        printf("\n%s",stone[i]);
}

}
